sentences.en: Except for some rather tame scenes in the slum, the scenery of the city is unequalled.
sentences.cn: 除了贫民窟中那些平淡的场景, 城市的面貌是无与伦比的.

sentences.en: His record as a show - jumper is unequalled.
sentences.cn: 他超越障碍赛马的记录无出其右.

sentences.en: LifePak's perfect combination makes it unequalled.
sentences.cn: 如沛的优良成分使得其他产品远远追在后面.

sentences.en: Of course Leo was intensely interested in this stupendous and unequalled sight.
sentences.cn: 利奥自然对这种惊人的不平等现象极为关注.

sentences.en: She regards it as a prospect of unequalled beauty.
sentences.cn: 她觉得,这简直是妙不可言的美景.

sentences.en: The camera combines rugged reliability with unequalled optical performance and speed.
sentences.cn: 这款相机既坚固耐用，又有超凡的光学性能和快门速度。

sentences.en: The hotel has a range of facilities unequalled in the city.
sentences.cn: 这家酒店拥有本市最好的各种设施。

sentences.en: The husky is unequalled for stamina and endurance.
sentences.cn: 爱斯基摩狗的体力和耐性是无双的.

sentences.en: The school provides research facilities unequalled in the country.
sentences.cn: 这所学校能提供在国内无与伦比的研究设施.

sentences.en: The university is unequalled in its research of chemistry.
sentences.cn: 这所大学在化学方面的研究是无与伦比的.

sentences.en: This record figure was unequalled for 13 years.
sentences.cn: 这项纪录保持了13年，无人能破。

sentences.en: We who possess a supreme commitment to spreading the Mystic Law are unequalled in strength.
sentences.cn: 任谁也敌不过弘扬妙法,拥有究极信心的我们.

words.tran_cn: 无与伦比的；不等同的，不能比拟的
